Description: Body sherd of Chian, possibly Grand Style, pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky brown; part of lotus flower in added white outline and spiked rosette in white with added red; exterior: painted decoration consisting of undetermined motif, possibly spear shafts; at top of sherd, part of possible filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0775) (phase 2)
